content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Furnace at position(x)
Consists of the following entities:
- Furnace (position x)

### Coal extraction point at position(x)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner mining drill (position x)

### Iron plate factory at position(x)
Consists of the following entities:
- Assembling machine (position x)
- Inserter (position y) that puts into the assembling machine
- Beltgroup (position z) that connects the furnace to the assembling machine

### ERROR TIPS

### Errors when crafting items due to insufficient resources
- Ensure you have enough required items in your inventory before attempting to craft. For example, crafting iron-gear-wheels requires iron-plates, which must be available.

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity on a tile before attempting to place it.

### Errors related to crafting machines
- Ensure that you have the necessary crafting machines or furnaces available to craft specific items.
